artist: Designer: William C. Bull; Manufacturer: Book of Knowledge (Grolier, Inc.)
description: metal bank in form of magician wearing black tuxedo, doing a trick on a blue, green and yellow platform; the magician puts his top hat over a coin and it disappears; magicians arms and head move
inscription:
Inscription  

on bottom, in raised letters: [REPRODUCED FROM ORIGINAL/ IN COLLECTION OF/ THE BOOK/ OF KNOWLEDGE]
on front and back in raised letters: [MAGICIAN BANK]
title: "Magician" (reproduction) mechanical bank
